name: n8n MCP Server
description: n8n Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants like Claude to build and execute n8n workflows. This server provides comprehensive n8n integration for workflow automation through AI chat interfaces.
short_desc: AI-powered n8n workflow automation via Model Context Protocol
author: n8n-mcp contributors
